subject: Invalid discount code
description_text:
Hi.

I am trying to use discount code NEW15 on your website, which is for new
racers, according to your website, to buy Simsonn HS shifter. However, the
code doesn't work. Why?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Kris Bijan,     The coupon has a minimum order requirement and can be used only when the order total reaches 199.
